resources.string: Here you can install the Xposed framework. It is the base for modules that can change the behaviour and look of your Android phone. For more information please see here.
Clean up (complete removal of the framework)
Xposed module is not activated yet
This module does not provide a user interface
Xposed module list was updated\nChanges will become active on reboot
This module requires a newer Xposed version (%s) and thus cannot be activated.
Xposed is not (yet) compatible with Android SDK version %d or your processor (only ARM is supported).
Xposed has not been tested with Android SDK version %d, but it seems to be compatible. You can try installing it if you feel adventurous.
This module does not specify the Xposed version it needs.
This module was created for Xposed version %1s, but due to incompatible changes in version %2s, it has been disabled.
